description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study - chimpanzee/orangutan
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical

different set of tools were presented to the participant - manipulation = participants were allowed to manipulate the tools freely before choosing one / observation - participants observed an experimenter manipulate the tools before choosing one
set of tools set presented to the participants
whether participants had previous experience with the tools - 1 = naive = have not tried any tool in the apparatus / 2 = have already tried one of the tools in the previous tool_set trial
whether the participant chose the straw-like tool
whether the participants used the tool at the apparatus
